means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 惠尔绰号，笨拙的大个子，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“鲸”(whale)

sentence.Network_en: The blue whale is the largest living thing on the planet.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓝鲸是地球上体型最大的生物。

sentence.Network_en: I had a whale of a time in Birmingham.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在伯明翰度过了一段非常快乐的时光。

sentence.Network_en: Norwegian whalers said yesterday they had harpooned a female minke whale.
sentence.Network_cn: 挪威的捕鲸人说昨天他们用捕鲸叉捕获了一头雌性小须鲸。

月份与星期的英文_百度文库 ... armadillo 犰狳 whale 鲸 dolphin 河豚.

马修·连恩_百度百科 ... 10. 一条大河向海洋 One River to the Sea 11. 群鲸之歌（whale） Whales 02. Seasons 四季.

list.abs: 布氏鲸（Bryde's Whale）别名鳀鲸、拟大须鲸，与塞鲸极为相似，但布氏鲸较不常浮现与喷气，亦像塞鲸在下潜之前会先拱起尾干。 …
日常生活中的英语单词_爱问知识人 ... seal 海豹 sperm whale 抹香鲸 killer whale 虎鲸.
鲸鲨(Whale Shark)，世界上体型最大的鱼，长达10米，体重逾10-15吨。名字中既是鲸，也是鲨，却不是鲸。
托福常用词组 - 豆丁网 ... blow up 炸毁 blue whale 蓝鲸 born into 出身于...家庭.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)an exceedingly good example of a particular thing

lj.lj_ly: you've been doing a whale of a job.

phrase.cizu_name: have a whale of a time

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hwæl, of Germanic origin

entry.def: Whales are very large mammals that live in the sea.
If you say that someone is having a whale of a time, you mean that they are enjoying themselves very much.

example.ex: I had a whale of a time in Birmingham.
example.tran: 我在伯明翰度过了一段非常快乐的时光。

means.word_mean: 1. a very large person; impressive in size or qualities
2. any of the larger cetacean mammals having a streamlined body and breathing through a blowhole on the head

sentences.en: The blue whale is the world's largest living animal.
sentences.cn: 蓝鲸是世界上最大的动物。
